name: Hari Narain Ravikumar
bio:
Hari Narain is currently pursuing a Master's in Electrical Engineering at UT Dallas. He finished 
			  his Bachelor's at NIT Raipur in India. At that time, he led the Students' Placements Office and was instrumental
			  in a perfect placement record in 2010. He is an engineer by choice and is also passionate about marketing. In 
			  addition, he is an entrepreneur and a huge Chelsea FC fan.
